product_name: REI Grand Tour 85 Travel Pack - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: Pairing incredible volume with great comfort for the long haul, this 85-liter travel pack has an adjustable suspension, a removable daypack and intuitive organization.
short_description: Pairing incredible volume with great comfort for the long haul, this 85-liter travel pack has an adjustable suspension, a removable daypack and intuitive organization.
